Rulings.Edison:
These rulings apply to all Union Monsters: https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/union-monsters
● ● If both "Machina Gearframe" and the equipped "Machina" monster are destroyed by the same effect, the effect of "Machina Gearframe" effect is not applied.
Rulings.Tengu:
When equipping to a monster:
● If the target is not a Machine, or is flipped face-down or leaves the field, 
this card is destroyed.

While equipped to a monster:
● If the equipped monster is flipped face-down or leaves the field, this card is destroyed at the exact same time (by game mechanics).
● This card is treated as an Equip Spell (and not a monster).

When Summoning this equipped card:
● If there is no empty Monster Zone when this effect resolves,
this card is sent to the GY.
● If the equipped monster is flipped face-down or leaves the field, this card is destroyed at the exact same time (by game mechanics).
Rulings.Goat: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.HAT:
When equipping to a monster:
● If the target of is not a Machine when this effect resolves,
this card is destroyed.
● If the target is flipped face-down or leaves the field,
this card remains in the Monster Zone (nothing happens).

While equipped to a monster:
● If the equipped monster is flipped face-down or leaves the field, this card is destroyed at the exact same time (by game mechanics).
● This card is treated as an Equip Spell (and not a monster).

When Summoning this equipped card:
● If there is no empty Monster Zone when this effect resolves,
this card is sent to the GY.
● If the equipped monster is flipped face-down or leaves the field, this card is destroyed at the exact same time (by game mechanics).

Rulings.Base: 1. Equipping this card is an Ignition Effect of a monster. Special Summoning this Equipped Card is considered the effect of a Spell Card.

PSCT.Edison:
① When Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Machina" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Machina Gearframe".
② Once per turn: you can activate 1 of these effects; ● Target 1 Machine you control; equip this monster to that target.
● Unequip and Special Summon this card in Attack Position.
③ If a monster equipped by this card's effect would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.
© A monster can never be equipped with more than 1 Union Monster.
PSCT.Tengu:
① When Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Machina" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Machina Gearframe".

equip this monster to that target.
● Unequip and Special Summon this card.
③ If a monster equipped by this card's effect would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.
